column1: # Nigerian ICL ACM Stress Test - Call Injection Data
#   CALL_MASKING     - International gateway with Nigerian CLI (FRAUD)
#   SIMBOX_PATTERN   - High-volume short calls from same CLI (FRAUD)
# LEGITIMATE LOCAL CALLS (MTN to MTN, Airtel to Glo, etc.)
# CALL MASKING ATTEMPTS (International gateway using Nigerian CLI - FRAUD!)
# These should be detected and flagged/blocked
# SIM-BOX PATTERNS (High volume, short duration, many destinations - FRAUD!)
# Same CLI calling many different numbers rapidly
# PORTED NUMBERS (MNP scenarios - should trigger MNP lookup)
